entry.title: FRANK McGARVEY DIAGNOSED WITH CANCER
entry.summary: CELTIC striking legend Frank McGarvey has been diagnosed with cancer, his family have announced on social media. His sons Scott and Sean posted messages on their Twitter accounts confirming that the 66-year-old former Hoops hero had been diagnosed on Thursday.
